modName: Armored Wolf of Armored SabreCat Mount Leg Wrap Fix
summary: Just a simple solution for people who get a missing texture on the armored wolf's leg wraps from the Armored SabreCat
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description[/b]
Just a simple solution for people who get a missing texture on the armored wolf's leg wraps from the Armored SabreCat Mount mod made by the great tumbajamba before he retired from modding to focus on his family because he is awesome, I made this since I noticed even MMOXReview was having the issue. You still need the original mod located here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url] which I highly recommend despite its armored wolf's incompletion. Be sure to endorse his mod, and don't worry, there are no scripts or plugins with my fix, so it's 100% safe.

[b]Installation[/b]
Nexus Mod Manager / NMM installation: Just click the green download button and install like any other mod and overwrite the files when asked.
Manual installation: To install manually extract the archive to the game directory and overwrite the files when asked.
Mod Organizer installation: I don't remember but just download and double click the download when complete and ignore what seems to be a conflict, it isn't, it's suppose to override that mesh. Also, check the box next to the mod's name in your list of mods if it isn't already.

[b]Required Mods[/b]: Only TumbaJamba's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]﻿ of course, install that mod first and then mine if you haven't already.

[b]Irrelevant[/b]
If you have the ability to or know someone who does, please, take note that his mod is now a modder's resource and, please, fix the remaining issues with that nearly completed mod, this armored wolf in particular ... which I personally call Fenrir, here are some of the issues listed on the forum post ﻿[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2009219-finish-armored-wolf-from-armored-sabre-cat-mount/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2009219-finish-armored-wolf-from-armored-sabre-cat-mount/

[/url]Credit's: TumbaJamba
author: Doesntcareaboutname
